summary: Implements a configuration manager that reads Ansible settings from YAML (and optionally INI) files, merges them with defaults, processes deprecations, and interprets plugin and server sections, exposing convenient methods to query values and resolve file system paths.
business_intent: Provide a reliable way for tools and extensions to access Ansible configuration data, ensuring correct handling of defaults, legacy options, and dynamic components such as plugins and servers, thereby simplifying configuration-driven workflows.
